abstract: Mr. Conceição is answering reader questions about how the global recession is affecting the world’s poorest countries, and what can or should be done to help them.
snippet: Mr. Conceição is answering reader questions about how the global recession is affecting the world’s poorest countries, and what can or should be done to help them.
lead_paragraph: We’re pleased to introduce Pedro Conceição, director of the Office of Development Studies (O.D.S) at the United Nations Development Program, the leading United Nations agency in the fight against poverty (and the agency that maintains the somewhat controversial Human Development Index, which we’ve written about before).

headline.main: Bring Your Questions for Pedro Conceição, U.N. Development Expert
